name: Suzie Vue
comment: Love this little powerhouse so much! Love the ability to shoot in raw and interchange lenses!

name: Mi Rony
comment: A great street camera. I've shot thousands of pictures and it's great. Love this camera a lot!

name: Chevy Danniel
comment: Took great pictures. Until started having issue with its auto focus but otherwise I have used this camera before.

name: Suzanne
comment: I don't have experience in photography but I was quickly able to get a hang of it. Easy to use and great quality.

name: Thalapathy Vijay
comment: Big fraud!!! This fujifilm xt10 product has faults on and off at the same time often ... Do not buy!

name: Nirob Hasan
comment: Very sharp - fun little camera. Bit of learning curve in getting familiar with menu.
